title: User Authentication: Implement User Registration
description:
As a job seeker, I want to create an account so that I can save and manage my favorite job postings.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Users can register with email and password
- Registration form validates email format
- Password has minimum security requirements (e.g., 8 characters, mix of uppercase/lowercase)
- User receives confirmation after successful registration

title: User Authentication: Implement User Login
description:
As a registered job seeker, I want to log in to my account so that I can access my saved job postings.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Users can log in using registered email and password
- Login form validates input fields
- Failed login attempts provide clear error messages
- Successful login redirects user to job search page
- Implement basic session management

title: Favorites: Add Save Job Functionality
description:
As a logged-in job seeker, I want to save a job posting to my favorites so that I can easily find and review it later.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Save icon appears on job cards
- Clicking save icon stores job in user's favorites
- Saved jobs are visually distinct (e.g., filled save icon)
- Jobs can be unsaved by clicking the icon again

title: Favorites: Create Saved Jobs Page
description:
As a logged-in job seeker, I want to view my saved job postings so that I can manage and review jobs I'm interested in.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Dedicated page shows all saved job postings
- Each saved job displays full job details
- Option to remove job from saved list
- Jobs are stored persistently across sessions

title: User Experience: Add Navigation for Saved Jobs
description:
As a logged-in job seeker, I want easy access to my saved jobs so that I can quickly review them.

Acceptance Criteria:
- Add 'Saved Jobs' link in main navigation menu
- Saved jobs link is only visible when user is logged in
- Clicking link takes user directly to Saved Jobs page
